effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use’s power is added to this move’s power, to a maximum of 200.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use’s power is added to this move’s power, to a maximum of 200.

short_effect.black_white: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.

flavor_text.black_white: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage.
